name: TikTok Darkmode+
description: Actually this style will bring your TikTok not just to darkmode, but to any color mode you want, plus the feature to add a custom background image! HOW TO INSTALL AND CUSTOMIZE THIS STYLE?? 👉Using Stylus Beta DONATE VIA PAYPAL
